verses.roman:
āmāra mādhurya nāhi bāḍhite avakāśe
e-darpaṇera āge nava nava rūpe bhāse

synonyms: āmāra—of Me; mādhurya—sweetness; nāhi—not; bāḍhite—to increase; avakāśe—opportunity; e-darpaṇera āge—in front of this mirror; nava nava—newer and newer; rūpe—in beauty; bhāse—shines.
translation: "My sweetness also has no room for expansion, yet it shines before that mirror in newer and newer beauty.
